briefTitle: Long Term Safety Assessment of SER120 in Patients With Nocturia

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients completed SPC-SER120-DB1-200901 and SPC-SER120-DB2-200902 studies
* Willing to provide consent for the study

Exclusion Criteria:

* Incontinence
* Diabetes Insipidus, Diabetes Mellitus
* CHF
* Renal Insufficiency
* Significant medical history which make participation unacceptable

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Serum Sodium
outcomeMeasures.description: Change in mean serum sodium on Day 8, Day 15, Day 22, Week 4, Week 8, Week 12, Week 20, Week 28 and Week 40 compared to Baseline
